content.query:
-- If one wants to see the distribution of goals by shot placement, 
-- then it could look like this simple query and resulting pie-chart
-- (or alternatively viewable as a data-grid).
--
-- Pie chart - Key: shot_place, Values: TOT_GOALS, Aggregation: Sum

SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN 
            shot_place_str == 'NA'
        THEN 'Unknown' 
        ELSE   
            shot_place_str 
        END shot_place,
    COUNT(1) AS TOT_GOALS
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://demosynapsedls01.dfs.core.windows.net/europesoccer/curated/game_events.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    )  AS [result]
 WHERE is_goal = 1
 GROUP BY shot_place_str
